pageProduct.name: Avene Eau Thermale Soothing Eye Contour Cream 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Soothing eye contour cream for sensitive eyes.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only.

Common Uses

Soothing and anti-irritating eye contour cream which hydrates, soothes  and protects the eye contour area and the eyelids. Suitable for contact lenses wearer and eyelids prone to irritations. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, paraben-free.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. CYCLOMETHICONE. GLYCERIN. SUCROSE STEARATE. PEG-12. SUCROSE DISTEARATE. TRIETHANOLAMINE. BATYL ALCOHOL. BISABOLOL. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLYCERIDES. CARBOMER. DEXTRAN SULFATE. DISODIUM EDTA. SODIUM ACETATE. SODIUM HYALURONATE. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE.

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening on clean and make-up-free skin, by gently dabbing the product along the orbital bones and the eye sockets. Follow with a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water.
